PROJECT(model_obj)
FILE(GLOB MODEL_OBJ_SOURCES *.cpp)
FILE(GLOB MODEL_OBJ_HEADERS *.h)

ADD_LIBRARY(${PROJECT_NAME} ${MODEL_OBJ_SOURCES} ${MODEL_OBJ_HEADERS})
SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(${PROJECT_NAME} PROPERTIES LINKER_LANGUAGE CXX)
TARGET_COMPILE_DEFINITIONS(${PROJECT_NAME} PRIVATE _CRT_SECURE_NO_WARNINGS) # just for model_obj warnings
ADD_CUSTOM_COMMAND(TARGET ${PROJECT_NAME} POST_BUILD COMMAND
                   ${CMAKE_COMMAND} -E copy $<TARGET_FILE:${PROJECT_NAME}> ${OUTPUT_DIR}${targetfile})
